text.section: A municipal corporation in Prince George's County shall have concurrent authority in its boundaries with the county Department of Environmental Resources, Licenses and Inspections Group, to seek compliance with zoning requirements to the extent that the requirements pertain to signs.

A municipal corporation in Prince George's County may enact local laws regulating fences erected in front of the building setback lines on all residential property located in the municipal corporation.
Any local law enacted under this section may not be less restrictive than any local law in effect or subsequently enacted by the county council.
